Title: Research Scientist in Cloud based Bioinformatics
Description: Do you want to develop ground-breaking bioinformatics solutions and be a part of a dedicated and ambitious team of expert bioinformaticians? If so, then you might be the right person to join our team as a Research Scientist for developing cloud based bioinformatics solutions in the Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) field. At Exiqon you will join us in developing molecular biology reagents and bioinformatic solutions for RNA analysis, which transform Life Science research and create innovative solutions for helping researchers in this field. As a Research Scientist you will play an important role in the development of our web based NGS analysis tools, cloud based services and tools for design of custom expression and functional analysis products. In particular, you will be involved in our cutting-edge NGS analysis product XploreRNA.

Jobindex Research Scientist in Cloud based Bioinformatics Exiqon A/S, Vedbaek Do you want to develop ground-breaking bioinformatics solutions and be a part of a dedicated and ambitious team of expert bioinformaticians? If so, then you might be the right person to join our team as a Research Scientist for developing cloud based bioinformatics solutions in the Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) field. At Exiqon you will join us in developing molecular biology reagents and bioinformatic solutions for RNA analysis, which transform Life Science research and create innovative solutions for helping researchers in this field. About the position As a Research Scientist you will play an important role in the development of our web based NGS analysis tools, cloud based services and tools for design of custom expression and functional analysis products. In particular, you will be involved in our cutting-edge NGS analysis product XploreRNA. XploreRNA is an amazing and easy to use cloud based data analysis platform, which we have invented. Learn more about the platform here: xplorerna.exiqon.com . We also expect you to contribute to the invention and development of other competitive Life Science products. This position is a great opportunity to use and expand your knowledge about; NGS data analysis, web/mobile tools, development of oligonucleotide based products for RNA expression and RNA functional analysis. You will be part of a multicultural company, working with multidisciplinary and enthusiastic colleagues from IT, R&D, Services, Manufacturing and Sales and Marketing to bring our products to the market backed by strong bioinformatics capabilities. We offer a high degree of responsibility in your own work and a possibility to develop innovative bioinformatics solutions in an informal environment. The position is located in Vedbæk, Denmark. Your profile A Ph.D. in bioinformatics, systems biology or equivalent work experience or education Programming experience with Ruby, C and PostgreSQL or equivalent languages An advantage to have knowledge of RoR, JS and AngularJS or similar A flair for detail while staying focused and goal oriented Excellent team playing skills, and ability to adapt quickly Excellent oral and written communication skills in English We offer A motivating and highly professional work environment within a successful ambitious Life Science company. An independent position with great development opportunities The opportunity to play an important role contributing to the success at Exiqon Salary corresponding to your qualifications Flexible working hours 5 weeks of holiday + 5 extra holidays We look forward to welcoming a new colleague who can contribute to the team, professionally as well as personally. If you have questions For additional information, contact Manager of Bioinformatics, Niels Tolstrup, by telephone at +45 4565 0444. Application Please submit your application and CV by email to nt@exiqon.com no later than January 17, 2015 . Applications will be considered as they arrive. About Exiqon Exiqon's products are based on the proprietary LNA™ technology. We operate in two business areas: Exiqon Life Sciences is one of the market leaders in solutions for RNA research, in particular for microRNA research products. Our research products are used by academia, biotech and pharmaceutical companies around the world to make revolutionary discoveries about the correlation between gene activity and the development of cancer and other diseases. Exiqon Diagnostics is developing a series of new molecular diagnostic products for cancer based on RNA and DNA. We also collaborate with pharmaceutical and diagnostic companies to develop novel molecular diagnostic tests for early detection of diseases which can help physicians make treatment decisions. Exiqon is listed on the NASDAQ OMX in Copenhagen. For more information about us, please visit exiqon.com . Skriv venligst i din ansøgning, at du så annoncen hos Jobindex. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Managing Consultant -Nordics (POS-309) Apptio - København Reporting to and working with a Regional Manager, this individual will own and lead specific customer engagements implementing our flagship SaaS solution. This position is an integral part of Apptioâs long term relationship with its customers, and the efforts put forth by this individual will directly impact the value realized by the customer and the ultimate success of the relationship. In order to succeed in this team, this individual must have the passion and energy to work in a startup, entrepreneurial, and fast paced environment. They must have the maturity, confidence, and experience to manage and partner with customers as well as the willingness, energy and technical ability to roll up their sleeves and work directly with the solution. This position will require frequent travel. Job Responsibilities: Own and lead multiple, simultaneous customer engagements implementing the Apptio SaaS solution, following Apptio methodology and utilizing Project Management best practices Develop strong customer relationships that enable Apptio to become a trusted advisor for our customerâs IT executives. Provide both engagement and technical leadership to the customer. Provide business acumen for customers and strive to understand the business problem we are solving in order to best configure the solution and exceed customer expectations. Gather functional and business requirements from client and translate into a functional hosted solution design according to client needs and scope of Apptio products/services. Manage project team activities and oversee completion of deliverables, managing schedules, meeting milestones, and ensuring technical success. Work with the product management and development organization to channel client feedback and solutions into future releases of the Apptio product suite. Work with content management to channel commonalities across customers into best practices processes & product delivered templates. Collaborate with other departments in the company to achieve customer satisfaction and resolve customer issues in a timely fashion. Work with Sales Account Management teams to develop SOWs and identify areas of solution expansion. Essential Skills: General: Demonstrated ability to manage individual and engagement-wide scope of work. Demonstrated client relationship and interpersonal skills. Strong project management skills and proven ability to execute against a defined methodology and deliver projects within scope, budget, and timeline Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem solving skills. Client-focused attitude -- a customer advocate. Team player with solid communication and presentation skills. Competent with packaged application software implementation practices. Strong analytical and problem solving skills. Strong skills in data analysis/manipulation. Ability to lead client training, design and knowledge transfer sessions both remote and on-site. A proven track record of meeting with senior management and executives as the subject matter expert. High level knowledge of enterprise IT organizational, business, and technical environments. Domain Focus (One or more): Specific knowledge and application of IT services and financial management including budgeting, cost allocations, capital & operating expense handling, program portfolio management, and application / infrastructure support. Operational knowledge of IT infrastructure domains including data centers, network / communications, server utilization, virtual environments, storage, and application development & maintenance. Technical application implementation experience especially related to knowledge and application of relational database concepts, working with large data sets and quickly detecting / resolving data-related issues, and leading iterative technical design activities. Experience & Education: Over 10 years of system implementation or SI consulting experience with at least five years as a senior consultant or manager. 4 year degree in engineering, computer science, MIS, finance or equivalent. Location & Travel: The position is located in the Nordics, Copenhagen. Willingness to travel; travel could be up to 60% to 80% depending on location of customers. Company Overview: Apptio is the leading provider of cloud-based Technology Business Management (TBM) software that helps CIOs manage the business of IT. Apptioâs suite of applications use business analytics to provide facts and insights about technology cost, value, and quality, so IT leaders can make faster, data-driven decisions. Hundreds of customers, including 40 percent of the Fortune 100, choose Apptio as their business system of record to align IT spending with business priorities. Apptio is also backed by some of the world's most prominent financial institutions including T. Rowe Price, Andreessen Horowitz, Greylock Partners, Madrona Ventures, Shasta Ventures. Apptio Inc. is not open to 3rd party solicitation or resumes for our posted FTE positions. Resumes received from 3rd party agencies that are unsolicited will be considered complimentary. Apptio, Inc. provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Senior JavaScript Innovative Lead Software Engineers Ework.fi - København For our client we are looking for 5 Senior JavaScript Innovative Lead Software Engineers. Do you want to develop innovative frontend solutions? Do you want to work in a highly innovative organization with a short span between idea and solution. The department is newly established, dynamic and rapidly growing with a strong sense of dedication to our clients customers. The purpose of the department is to deliver innovative solutions directly to our clients banking customers. Our client works with some of the most innovative and advanced technologies organized in small cross-functional teams in very close contact with direct business reference. A new initiative is innovative Fridays where time is allocated to work innovatively with the ideas of your colleagues across the formal structures. You apply Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) to architect and build for scale, performance and reliability. You understand and have an overview of the business process you are supporting as part of an overall solution. You are part of a pair programming- and pair review culture and you are expected to be able to present your ideas in both small and large settings. Solid experience with JavaScript framework You have a Master's degree or higher in Computer Science, Math, Physics or equivalent combined with solid experience ( > 5 years) working with software engineering within JavaScript framework. You are familiar with Domain driven design and Micro service pattern. You are able to both code and architect excellent code and Test driven design is the backbone of your work. Knowledge of the following technologies is an advantage: • AngularJS, Node.JS or similar technologies. • Ruby, GitHub and Unix development a plus. • Rest API or other service approach and familiarity with Hadoop, HBase, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra or similar NoSQL technologies • Concurrency, multithreading and distributed systems. • Virtualization and cloud infrastructure technologies. • HTML/CSS. • Testing suites and Unit tests on the frameworks listed above. Your greatest assets are your abilities to collaborate with many different types of people, challenge ideas and come with even better ones supported by your technological foundation - and last but not least to put the customers first and let solutions be driven by understanding their needs and ecosystems. You are a great communicator with strong social skills and you are able to work together with diverse group of personalities and professional backgrounds -developers, designers, analysts and strategists. You are able to work autonomously in an innovative, slim and agile organization with the mandate to move fast and do things differently - e.g. test with the customer, start before having ‘all the answers’ and dare to fail and learn. Re-factoring does not scare you. Apply as soon as possible - we plan interviews as applications are received. Start: ASAP Duration: 6 Months with 6 months prolongation Location: Copenhagen Work load: Fulltime Working language: English and/or Danish Please, apply directly through our system with - your updated CV - your hourly rate (all included) - name and telephone number to 2 reference persons eWork can contact (we will contact your reference persons first after contact with you) - information on when you are available to start - in the Motivation describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to earlier assignments, employments, education and personal qualities. 1 dag siden - gem job » Vis eller anvend på job Send en e-mail til en ven med dette job Job på Ework.fi i København Gennemse job - Om Indeed - Hjælpecenter Cookies hjælper os med at levere vores tjenester. Vores brugere har det bedste boligsøger-CV som de kan få, og med en god brug af sociale medier, sørger vi for at de bliver godt promoveret. Spring til indhold Spring til søgning på Forsvaret.dk Spring til højrebar Globalnavigation Søg på Forsvarets hjemmeside Nyheder Internationale Nationale Øvrige Regionale Døgnrapporten Viden om Opgaver Nationale opgaver Udland Materiel I tal Historie Forsvarsmuseer Generelt Temaer Værnepligt Flagdag Mangfoldighed Medalje 1948-2009 Støjportal Ejendomssalg Job Ledige stillinger - civile stillinger - militære stillinger Job i Forsvaret Uddannelse Forside - uddannelse Uddannelser i Forsvaret Mød en elev Mød Forsvaret Kontakt os Om os Mission og vision Organisation Publikationer Kontakt Presserum Alle Flyvevåbnet Hæren Søværnet Værnsfælles Links Udd.-institutioner English Information om anvendelse af Cookies Forsvarets telefon- og adresseliste Forsvaret på YouTube Forsvaret på Facebook Søg Søg Forside > Job > Ledige stillinger > Stillingsvisning Information om anvendelse af Cookies Forsvarets telefon- og adresseliste Forsvaret på YouTube Forsvaret på Facebook Indholdsområde Job Programmør søges til Rekrutteringsafdelingen i FPS, Ballerup (genopslag) Programmør søges til Rekrutteringsafdelingen i Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse i Ballerup (Genopslag) Vi har behov for en medarbejder med alsidig IT og programmør baggrund til at håndtere både den daglige drift af vores IT-systemer, og til at varetage udviklingen af vores IT -systemer. Stillingen kan søges af kandidater med både civile og militær baggrund (seniorsergent). Om os Vi er en værnsfælles myndighed, Rekrutteringsafdelingen under Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse. Rekrutteringsafdelingen varetager Forsvarets Dag processen (sessionsbehandlingen), indkaldelser til værnepligt, afprøvning til Forsvarets uddannelser og kampagner for at rekruttere til Forsvarets uddannelser. Rekrutteringsafdelingen er beliggende med hovedkontoret i Ballerup, afprøvningssektionen i Jonstrup og med rekrutteringscentre i Høvelte, Slagelse, Fredericia, Herning og Aalborg. Vi tilbyder en arbejdsplads med gode kolleger, militære som civile, i et miljø med en uformel omgangstone. Vi tilbyder et varieret arbejdstempo, hvor arbejdsopgaverne veksler i omfang. Den overvejende del af arbejdet ligger indenfor almindelig tjenestetid og der indgår ikke øvelser og vagter i stillingen. Om stillingen Rekrutteringsafdelingen anvender en række myndighedsspecifikke IT-systemer, bl.a. til at håndtere administrationen af Forsvarets Dag (sessionen) og til at håndtere indkaldelsen af værnepligtige til Forsvarets værnepligtsuddannelser. Vi anvender forskellige IT-systemer, og har behov for at du er ansvarlig for den daglige drift af vores IT-systemer, afhjælper med fejlrettelser og service på IT-systemerne, samt deltager i udviklingen af vores IT-systemer. Om dig Den rette kandidat (civil): Du er uddannet programmør. Du har erfaring med udvikling i Oracle Forms og Oracle Reports (11g), herunder erfaring i programmering i PL/SQL og gerne kendskab til Oracle SQL*developer. Du har gerne flere års erfaring med at arbejde med Oracle databaser. du har en professionel og ansvarsbevidst tilgang til opgaverne, er analytisk, initiativrig og formår selvstændigt at igangsætte opgave- og problemløsninger. Du kan samarbejde, og er i stand til at inddrage andres erfaringer og synsvinkler i skabelsen af fælles løsninger. Du bevarer overblikket uden at overse detaljer, som er afgørende for helheden. Du arbejder struktureret også under tidspres. Din personlige integritet er nøgleelementer for opnåelse af fælles løsninger. Den rette kandidat (militær) Du er seniorsergent med IT/programmør baggrund. Alternativt er du oversergent, og bedømt egnet til seniorsergent. Du har erfaring med udvikling i Oracle Forms og Oracle Reports (11g), herunder erfaring i programmering i PL/SQL og gerne kendskab til Oracle SQL*developer. Du har gerne flere års erfaring med at arbejde med Oracle databaser. Du har en professionel og ansvarsbevidst tilgang til opgaverne, er analytisk, initiativrig og formår selvstændigt at igangsætte opgave- og problemløsninger. Du kan samarbejde, og er i stand til at inddrage andres erfaringer og synsvinkler i skabelsen af fælles løsninger. Du bevarer overblikket uden at overse detaljer, som er afgørende for helheden. Du arbejder struktureret også under tidspres. Din personlige integritet er nøgleelementer for opnåelse af fælles løsninger. Om dine ønskelige kvalifikationer: Du har indsigt i analyse og design. Du har erfaring med udveksling af data mellem løst koblede systemer. Du har et lettere kendskab til weblogic. Du har indsigt i SQL server databaser. Ansættelsesvilkår Civilt: Som programmør, vil din ansættelse ske i henhold til gældende organisationsaftale mellem Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse og HK/ samdata. Militært: Stillingen er en seniorsergent stilling på overenskomstmæssige vilkår. Stillingen kan besættes med en tjenestemand. Løn m.v. er reguleret ved den til enhver tid gældende CO10 fællesoverenskomst og organisationsaftale for Centralforeningen for stampersonel. Fælles for de ansættelsesformer er: Dit faste tjenestested vil være Ballerup. Som ansat i Forsvaret er du omfattet af nogle særlige vilkår. Det betyder bl.a., at du skal kunne sikkerhedsgodkendes, og at du er forpligtet til at deltage i fredsskabende og fredsbevarende operationer mv. Du skal kunne beherske dansk og engelsk i både skrift og tale. Du skal sikkerhedsgodkendes til FORTROLIGT. Forsvaret er en mangfoldig arbejdsplads, og vi vil gerne afspejle det omkringliggende samfund. Vi opfordrer derfor alle interesserede uanset personlig baggrund til at søge stillingen, fordi vi tror på, at forskellighed styrker opgaveløsningen gennem dynamik og nytænkning Kontakt og ansøgning Hvis du vil vide mere om stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte major Torben Grinderslev på telefon 72 81 92 51 eller seniorsergent Johnny Nielsen på telefon 72 81 92 52. Spørgsmål vedrørende løn - og ansættelsesforhold kan rettes til HR-konsulent seniorsergent Kjeld Hildebrandt Hansen på telefon 72 81 91 67 eller mail kjeldh@mil.dk. Ansøgningsfristen er den 14. februar 2016. Ansættelsessamtaler forventes afholdt i uge 7 i 2016. Stillingen er til besættelse snarest muligt. For at komme i betragtning til stillingen, skal vi bede dig fremsende din ansøgning med tilhørende bilag elektronisk via linket. Om Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse Forsvarsministeriets Personalestyrelse (FPS) er overordnet ansvarlig for personaleområdet, herunder HR-driften i Forsvaret. FPS er som arbejdsplads kendetegnet af høj faglighed, fokus på vidensdeling og gode menneskelige relationer samt et godt og velfungerende arbejdsmiljø. Hovedsædet er placeret i Ballerup, men FPS har decentrale partnerelementer rundt omkring i hele landet. FPS organisation består også af Forsvarets Center for Arbejdsmiljø og Veterancentret. Læs mere om Forsvaret som arbejdsplads på www.Forsvaret.dk Generel information Tjenestested Ballerup Lokation Region Hovedstaden Værn Værnsfælles Funktionsniveau M231 Seniorsergent Ansøgningsfrist 14.02.2016 Indrykningsdato 17.12.2015 Ansøgningsforløbet Hvad sker der med min ansøgning? Vi behandler din ansøgning hurtigst muligt efter ansøgningsfristen. Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden IT Developer NORDEA BANK DANMARK A/S IT Developer/Senior IT Developer for CMS Reporting in IT Capital Markets, Taastrup The position we offer The CMS Reporting team is responsible for development of our reporting solutions. This includes management, legal and operational reporting, e.g. ART (Advanced Reporting Tool), Tax reporting, MIFID reporting and etc. Our overall goal is to develop and provide the best solution for reporting in Capital Markets. As part of our team you will be involved in sub-projects and entire projects, and you will quickly be given responsibility for tasks and/or projects. We work with many different technologies like Java, Oracle, Datastage, BI Publisher/OBIEE, a variety of data sources and etc. As our new IT developer, we expect you to: -Have a strong analytical mind-set -Have an interest in understanding our financial business domain -Have experience with object oriented programming, preferably Java development -Experience with database technology like Oracle, preferably also knowledge about ETL and rule design -Experience with software testing -Good understanding of IT architecture -Use best practice and take part in technical discussions for our solution designs -Being able to take lead on our tasks -Be part of an informal team where we work agile and take pride in providing a great service for your colleagues and our stakeholders, but not least also have fun -Be independent and self-motivated, you always seek to develop yourself and strive to go from good to great, yet you are a strong team player The qualifications you need We look for a person that have the following qualifications: -You master effective communication in English both oral and written and preferably also in a Scandinavian language -An academic background in Computer Science, Mathematics or engineering within IT -It is mandatory that you have experience with Object Oriented Programming and knowledge about the develop/test/deploy cycle More information and send application If you have questions regarding this job please contact Ronni Lück, Head of CMS Reporting on +45 61 22 41 75 or ronni.luck@nordea.com . Please send your application and CV in Danish or English no later than 22 January 2016. We offer cloud, Linux, middleware, storage, and virtualization technologies, together with award-winning global customer support, consulting, and implementation services. Red Hat is a rapidly growing company supporting more than 90% of Fortune 500 companies. Job summary The Red Hat Consulting team is seeking a Senior Cloud Consultant to join us. In this role, you will lead the on-site delivery and implementation of great technology that delivers freedom, flexibility, choice, and superior performance. You'll gain an understanding of our customers' infrastructure and business needs and make recommendations appropriate for their environment. This role is ideal for an infrastructure consultant who wants to build on their core technical expertise and work in a fast-paced environment promoting Red Hat solutions. This role can be located anywhere in the Nordics. Primary job responsibilities Be the subject matter expert at the client site, addressing the technical, developmental, or strategic IT needs Manage problem identification, system architecture definition, software specification and design, testing, and deployment of open source solutions Learn new technologies and apply those concepts to customer needs Adapt to changing customer requirements Respond to incidents, escalations, and exceptions in a professional manner Required skills Experience as a consultant or in a related role; an understanding of the open source community Experience with UNIX or Linux database administration and tuning Background in cloud implementations and an understanding of their business impact Understanding of the software-defined datacenter and related concepts Experience implementing virtualization technologies in an enterprise setting and with enterprise-wide deployments Ability to communicate value, progress, and metrics of key projects to required stakeholders Exceptional analytical, problem solving, project management, and planning skills Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal Experience with related technologies like Ruby and Python Experience working with cloud management solutions and tools ITIL foundation certification Willingness to travel up to 60% Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, uniformed services, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law. Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden It-medarbejder til helpdesk Statsbiblioteket Statsbiblioteket søger It-medarbejder til helpdesk Statsbiblioteket søger, til ansættelse snarest muligt, en it-medarbejder til driftsgangens helpdesk, der betjener bibliotekets medarbejdere. Du vil sammen med de fire øvrige ansatte på kontoret varetage daglig 1. og 2. niveau support på alle Statsbibliotekets it-systemer i den sammenhængende biblioteksstruktur, som Statsbiblioteket er en del af. Helpdeskens medarbejdere organiserer på alle hverdage en vagtordning imellem sig. I øjeblikket dækker vagtordningen i tidsrummet klokken 08.00 til 16.00. Arbejdsopgaver: Eksempler på konkrete opgaver kan være: Overvågning af Linuxbaserede services, opsætning og nedtagning af medarbejder-pc'ere, fejlsøgning på manglende netværksforbindelser, vedligehold af driftsdokumentation, brugeradministration, generel overvågning, hjælp til printproblemer etc. På længere sigt forventes det, at du bliver en del af it-driftens systemovervågning uden for normal arbejdstid. Systemovervågning foregår hjemmefra og udløser rådighedstillæg. Kvalifikationer: Du har en relevant it-uddannelse Du er systematisk og analytisk indstillet Du er positiv, serviceorienteret og god til at kommunikere både skriftligt og mundtligt Du har primært erfaring med Windows og Windows-servere, men også gerne med andre platforme Du har kendskab til Linux Kendskab til bibliotekssystemet Aleph vil være en fordel, men ikke et krav Du har lyst til og evner at deltage i tværfagligt samarbejde. Løn- og ansættelsesforhold Stillingen er på fuld tid og ansættelsesstedet vil være i Aarhus. Ansættelsen vil ske i henhold til relevant overenskomst med Finansministeriet og efter forhandling med den forhandlingsberettigede organisation. Du skal være indstillet på at aflevere straffeattest på anmodning. Har du spørgsmål til stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Lise Nielsen på tlf. 8946 2019 eller på mail lin@statsbiblioteket.dk Du kan finde flere oplysninger om Statsbiblioteket på vores hjemmeside. Alle interesserede uanset personlig baggrund opfordres til at søge. Ansøgning Ansøgning inkl. CV og uddannelsespapirer skal være Statsbiblioteket i hænde senest 21. januar 2016. Ansættelsessamtaler forventes afholdt på dagene 28. og 29. januar. Stillingen kan kun søges elektronisk via linket 'søg stillingen'. Ved eventuelle tekniske problemer, kontakt venligst HR Manager Talent Solutions Support på 7244 0644. Statsbiblioteket hører under Kulturministeriet. Statsbiblioteket varetager nationale biblioteksfunktioner som pligtafleveringsbibliotek, som hjemsted for Statens Avissamling og Statens Mediesamling. Statsbiblioteket er hovedbibliotek for Aarhus Universitet. Herudover varetager Statsbiblioteket landsdækkende funktioner som overcentral for landets folkebiblioteker. Der er ca. 270 medarbejdere på Statsbiblioteket. Title: Styrelsen for It og Læring (STIL) søger medarbejdere til support og vedligehold af it-løsninger på uddannelsesområdet

HTML_Text:

Virksomheden kan se dine personlige data som navn, adresse mm. Derved er du synlig når virksomheden skal rekruttere nye medarbejdere. Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden Styrelsen for It og Læring (STIL) søger medarbejdere til support og vedligehold af it-løsninger på uddannelsesområdet Styrelsen for It og Læring Har du flair for it og kendskab til den praktiske hverdag på ungdomsuddannelsesområdet? Motiveres du af at hjælpe når der er spørgsmål til de administrative it systemer på skolerne? Har du lyst til en udadvendt rolle, hvor du har daglig kontakt med brugerne af de administrative it systemer? Vil du være med til at opbygge en ny professionel supportfunktion? Så har vi et spændende job til dig i Styrelsen for It og Læring! Vi er i STIL påbegyndt en omlægning it-understøttelsen på ungdomsuddannelsesområdet. Fra at udvikle og vedligeholde store centrale løsninger, skal vi fremover fokusere på at bygge central infrastruktur, som skal spille sammen med private leverandørers it-løsninger. Som et led i denne ændrede opgaveløsning, er STIL i gang med en større omlægning af support og vejledning på ungdomsuddannelsesområdet. Vi søger derfor medarbejdere, der har lyst til at være med til at opbygge og omlægge den nuværende support. Der er tale om 2 typer stillinger, og ansættelserne vil ske i enten Kontor for Brugersupport og Systemvejledning eller i Kontor for Elevadministrativ It. For begge stillinger gælder, at der vil være mulighed for ansættelse enten i København eller Aarhus. Særligt for ansættelserne i Kontor for Brugersupport og Systemvejledning Kontoret får en central rolle i den fremadrettede support til skolernes administrative it-understøttelse. Omlægningen af supporten er et led i en ny strategi, hvor der er fokus på at levere kompetent 1. linje support på styrelsens eksterne supportområder. Du indgår i et team med fokus på de administrative it systemer og processer på ungdomsuddannelsesområdet. Din dagligdag er derfor primært rettet mod brugerne, men omfatter også dialog med produktejere, it-drift m.v., så erfaringer fra supporten kan indgå i den fortsatte udvikling af vores løsninger. Vi prioriterer videndeling højt. Du skal bl. a. varetage følgende opgaver: Brugersupport (telefonisk og skriftligt) på anvendelsen af it i skolernes administration. Fokus på en mere proaktiv support ved bl.a. vidensopsamling i nyt supportsystem. Skrive og opdatere vejledninger, så brugerne bliver så selvhjulpne som muligt. Samarbejde og kommunikere med skolernes superbrugere. Din profil Du har flair for it og erfaring med brugersupport - gerne fra administration på en uddannelsesinstitution Du har lyst til at være med til at opbygge en professionel og proaktiv supportfunktion og har et naturligt fokus på udvikling og forbedring. Vi lægger vægt på, at du: Har en relevant erhvervsuddannelse, en kort videregående uddannelse eller tilsvarende kompetencer opnået på anden vis. Har erfaring eller interesse i at give brugerne en faglig kompetent og effektiv support. Tager ansvar for struktureret opsamling/dokumentation og videndeling. Er god til at kommunikere såvel skriftligt som mundtligt. Trives i et miljø, der er midt i en forandringsproces og præget af mange forskellige opgaver. Kan arbejde både selvstændigt og i teams. Flere oplysninger Du er velkommen til at kontakte os for at høre nærmere om stillingen ved at ringe til konsulent Sanne Palner Brunbech på tlf. 35 87 83 44, email: sanne.palner.brunbech@stil.dk eller specialkonsulent Louise Sponholtz på tlf. 35 87 83 08, email: louise.sponholtz@stil.dk . Særligt for ansættelserne i Kontor for Elevadministrativ It Styrelsen for It og Læring omlægger i disse år it-understøttelsen af særligt erhvervsuddannelsesområdet. En række eksisterende centrale løsninger skal enten afvikles eller moderniseres. Kontoret er tovholder på hele denne store og spændende omlægning. I forbindelse med moderniseringen af it-understøttelsen og omlægningen af vores supportmodel har vi brug for ekstra ressourcer til at håndtere 2. linje support på de eksisterende studieadministrative løsninger. Som medarbejder i Kontor for Elevadministrativ It kommer du til at indgå i et tæt samarbejde med andre produktejere, supporten, driftskontoret og vores eksterne leverandører. Din profil Du er hjemmevant på ungdomsuddannelsesområdet, forstår skolernes administration og kan håndtere den daglige praksis på området. Vi søger en teknisk dygtig medarbejder, der kan analysere og finde løsninger på komplicerede it-problemer. Du sætter pris på at have en afvekslende hverdag med forskellige typer af opgaver. Vi lægger vægt på, at du: Har en relevant erhvervsuddannelse, en kort eller mellemlang videregående uddannelse eller tilsvarende kompetencer opnået på anden vis. Har erfaring med eller interesse for håndtering af it-support med brugerhenvendelser og kommunikation, der virker. Er engageret og sætter pris på at give brugerne en faglig kompetent og effektiv support. Har gode skriftlige og mundtlige formuleringsevner. Har gode samarbejdsevner, et godt overblik og er god til at koordinere. Har lyst til at tilegne dig ny viden og trives med at arbejde selvstændigt såvel som i teams. Det vil være en fordel, hvis du allerede har kendskab til de eksisterende løsninger og et generelt kendskab til ungdomsuddannelsessektoren. Flere oplysninger Du er velkommen til at kontakte os for at høre nærmere om stillingen ved at ringe til kontorchef Signe Rønn Sørensen på tlf. 89 37 66 19 eller email: signe.ronn.sorensen@stil.dk . Om os Styrelsen for It og Læring er en styrelse under Ministeriet for Børn, Undervisning og Ligestilling. Vi fremmer den digitale udvikling på undervisningsområdet, og vores primære fokusområder er øget anvendelse af it i undervisningen og understøttelse af effektiv institutionsdrift ved brug af it. Vi beskæftiger ca. 290 medarbejdere fordelt mellem København og Aarhus. Vi tilbyder Vi tilbyder et job med gode muligheder for faglig og personlig udvikling. Vi sætter et højt ambitionsniveau og vores opgaver bliver løst af dygtige og engagerede medarbejdere. Løn og ansættelse Løn og ansættelsesvilkår fastsættes i forhold til gældende overenskomst i staten. Stillingerne ønskes besat pr. 1. april eller eventuelt før. Arbejdsstedet er Styrelsen for It og Læring, Vester Voldgade 123, 1552 København V eller Olof Palmes Allé 38, 8200 Aarhus N. Ansøgning Ansøgningsfristen er onsdag d. 3. februar 2016. Vi forventer at afholde ansættelsessamtaler i uge 6. Du søger stillingen via nedenstående link, hvor du kan uploade din ansøgning indtil ansøgningsfristens udløb. I ansøgningsskemaet har du mulighed for at angive, om der er én af stillingerne, du er særligt interesseret i.  Ansøgninger modtaget efter ansøgningsfristens udløb indgår ikke i den videre proces. I Styrelsen for It og Læring ønsker vi en sammensætning af medarbejdere, der afspejler det omgivende samfund, og vi vurderer udelukkende ansøgere på baggrund af kvalifikationer og kompetencer. Læs mere om Styrelsen for It og Læring på www.stil.dk . Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Senior Software Developer Tradeshift - København Tradeshift is looking for a København-based, outstanding backend developer with web development experience to join our kick-ass development team. You will become a member of an international, skilled, cross-functional and self-driven production team that includes developers, designers and product people. At Tradeshift, we want to change the way companies do electronic business together - globally. We work hard and our teams have great freedom and responsibility to choose the best solutions, technologies and approaches to evolve the product to the next level. We expect you to enjoy engaging with customers and partners directly to help them successfully integrate with our platform. Additionally, you will be building the vitals tools needed to increase user adoption. And we expect that you understand how your technical solutions contribute to realizing a broader vision, and that you have a passion for interacting with many different people to achieve a goal. You are strong in several of the following areas: • Deep Java skills, experience with frameworks and library collections such as Spring and Apache commons • Experience with Linux/Unix, Apache, Tomcat, Jetty in live environments. • Experience with or interest for high-scalability distributed system technologies • Working experience in structured development and build environments (continuous integration, automated testing, automated configuration and deployment) • Experience with internet programming (REST, SOAP, client/server, Ajax) and related security paradigms (e.g. OAuth, OpenId, SSO/SAML, WS-Security, PKI) • Good database skills (Postgresql, Oracle, Mysql, SQL Server or similar) • Experience with HTML, CSS, Javascript + JQuery or similar, Ajax + JSON and web frameworks such as Grails, PHP, Ruby on Rails, Django, Spring webflow, struts. Knowledge of Angular is a plus • Curiosity towards new technology, programming languages, frameworks, etc... We expect you to: • Be absolutely kick-ass at what you do • 4+ years of professional experience, or working knowledge of black magic • Be fluent in English speaking, reading and writing • Know a lot about what's happening in the world of cutting-edge Web, SaaS/PaaS development 2 dage siden - gem job » Vis eller anvend på job Send en e-mail til en ven med dette job Senior Software Developer Job i København Job på Tradeshift i København Gennemse job - Om Indeed - Hjælpecenter Cookies hjælper os med at levere vores tjenester. Tradeshift is disrupting the enterprise software space in a big way. By connecting companies of all sizes and providing them with the platform, network and tools needed to develop apps, communicate in real-time and create value from old processes like invoicing, payments and workflow, Tradeshift is redefining an enterprise space that has seen little change in many years. We recognize that business is messy and business is social. Understanding these two facts drives the development of Tradeshift - a platform for all your business interactions. This role is for a senior individual contributor whose primary responsibility is to develop testing strategy, test plans, and test cases. The Sr. QA Engineer will work in parallel with the development teams to provide significant input during the development processes with regards to test requirements, testability, maintainability, and supportability. We are looking for someone with experience working on and improving quality of complex business applications. The right candidate is someone who absolutely loves testing complex software products, improving quality and is extremely passionate about testing as a career. Tradeshift has a strong engineering culture focused on agile development methodologies, including strong commitment to agile best practices of automated testing and continuous integration. The initial project will be a strategic program and will require leading quality assurance process across multiple teams. This is a new position for our company, so It’s a great opportunity to help us figure out how to balance delivery velocity while properly investing in quality. 2 dage siden - gem job » Vis eller anvend på job Send en e-mail til en ven med dette job Senior QA Engineer Job i København Job på Tradeshift i København Gennemse job - Om Indeed - Hjælpecenter Cookies hjælper os med at levere vores tjenester.
